welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Morden, UK! Get ready to be charmed by our historic town known for its beautiful parks and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Morden has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Northolt Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly domestic and European flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly long-haul flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves mainly British Airways flights.

wifi.note: Free for 45 minutes, then requires payment.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Jet Centre
terminals.description: The Private Jet Centre at London City Airport caters to private and business jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gatwick Airport, serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The second terminal at Gatwick Airport, also serving a variety of airlines and destinations.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves as the primary hub for all commercial and private aviation activities.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Redhill Aerodrome caters to the needs of private and recreational pilots, offering a range of services and facilities.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport for all passengers and visitors.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Farnborough Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Farnborough Airport is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Blackbushe Airport caters to private and executive flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Rochester Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Rochester Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
